segments.text: I notice the woman is standing in a puddle, but she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and she’s drying a plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets if she doesn’t turn it off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really step in before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
